column6:
FAN FAVE JEFF PARKER RETURNS!,2008,5
Giant-Girl hates Spider-Man. Spider-Man hates Ant-Man. Ant-Man hates Iron Man. Iron Man hates...everyone. Where is all this hate coming from? Some kind of... MONGER, perhaps?
All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | artist:Ig Guara | penciller (cover):Leonard Kirk | inker:Jay Leisten | writer:Jeff Parker | letterer:Dave Sharpe
